PHRASE.LANG:
Experience the original music from Emo Ray outside of the game with this Boombox. This BoomBox comes preloaded with "Six Feet Down." You can earn the rest of the songs in the game by completeing the following tasks: 
 • Complete Chapters 1-4 in Story mode to receive "Wallflowers in Bloom"
 • Complete Mission Pack 1 and Mission Pack 2 to receive "Love Hurts"
 • Complete Chapters 5-8 in Story mode to receive "Change the World"
 • Complete Mission Pack 3 and Mission Pack 4 to receive "Making Out"
 
 Every track comes with vocals or the instrumental track from the game. Don't forget to check out the band who made these songs: So Long Davey! [#Legal]

Vivez la musique originale de Emo Ray en dehors du jeu avec cette Boombox. Ce BoomBox est préchargé avec "Six Feet Down». Vous pouvez gagner le reste des chansons dans le jeu en completeing les tâches suivantes: \ n • Termine les chapitres 1-4 dans le mode Story pour recevoir Wallflowers "en fleurs" \ n • Terminez la mission Pack 1 et 2 Mission Pack pour recevoir "Love Hurts" \ n • Termine les chapitres 5-8 dans le mode Story pour recevoir «Changer le monde" \ n • Mission Pack Complet 3 et Mission Pack 4 pour recevoir "Making Out" \ n \ N Chaque piste est livré avec la voix ou la piste instrumentale de la partie. Ne pas oublier de vérifier la bande qui a fait ces chansons: Davey So Long![#Legal]

Erleben Sie die Original Musik aus Emo Ray außerhalb des Spiels mit dieser Boombox. Dieser Boom kommt vorinstalliert mit "Six Feet Down." Sie können den Rest der Songs im Spiel verdienen completeing die folgenden Aufgaben: \ n • Komplette Kapitel 1-4 im Story-Modus auf "Wallflowers in Bloom" \ n erhalten • Komplette Mission Pack 1 und Mission Pack 2 zu erhalten "Love Hurts" \ n • Komplette Kapitel 5-8 im Story-Modus zu empfangen "Change the World" \ n • Komplette Mission Pack 3 und Mission Pack 4 auf "Making Out" \ n erhalten \ N Jeder Track kommt mit Gesang oder dem instrumentalen Track aus dem Spiel. Vergessen Sie nicht, bitte zuerst die Band, die diese Lieder gemacht: So Long Davey![#Legal]

Vivi la musica originale di Ray Emo al di fuori del gioco con questo Boombox. Questo BoomBox viene precaricato con "Six Feet Down." Puoi guadagnare il resto delle canzoni nel gioco completeing le seguenti operazioni: \ n • Completa il capitolo 1-4 in modalità Storia per ricevere Wallflowers "in fiore" \ n • Completa la Missione Pack 1 e Mission Pack 2 per ricevere "Love Hurts" \ n • Completa il capitolo 5-8 in modalità Storia per ricevere "Cambiare il mondo" \ n • Confezione Completa la Missione 3 e Mission Pack 4 per ricevere "Making Out" \ n \ N Ogni pista è dotata di voce o la traccia strumentale dal gioco. Non dimenticate di controllare la band che ha fatto queste canzoni: Davey So Long![#Legal]

Disfrute de la música original de Emo Ray fuera del juego con este Boombox. Esta BoomBox viene precargado con "Six Feet Down." Usted puede ganar el resto de las canciones en el juego por completeing las siguientes tareas: \ n • Completa los capítulos 1-4 en el modo historia en recibir "Wallflowers in Bloom" \ n • Completa la misión Pack 1 y Paquete de Misión 2 para recibir "Love Hurts" \ n • Completa los capítulos 5-8 en el modo historia en recibir "cambiar el mundo" \ n • Pack Completa la misión 3 y Mission Pack 4 para recibir "Making Out" \ n \ N Cada tema viene con las voces o la pista instrumental del juego. No se olvide de revisar la banda que hizo estas canciones: So Long Davey![#Legal]

Experience the original music from Emo Ray outside of the game with this Boombox. This BoomBox comes preloaded with "Six Feet Down." You can earn the rest of the songs in the game by completeing the following tasks: 
 • Complete Chapters 1-4 in Story mode to receive "Wallflowers in Bloom"
 • Complete Mission Pack 1 and Mission Pack 2 to receive "Love Hurts"
 • Complete Chapters 5-8 in Story mode to receive "Change the World"
 • Complete Mission Pack 3 and Mission Pack 4 to receive "Making Out"
 
 Every track comes with vocals or the instrumental track from the game. Don't forget to check out the band who made these songs: So Long Davey! 

※Active items provide more functionality than normal items. You may only place limited numbers of the active items in your apartment or clubhouse at any time.[#Legal]
